data.text:
Joining the Funktifino Allstars for our regular party in the sky...

LEGENDARY DJ & PRODUCER

MICHAEL GRAY

100 Limited Tickets Available

Michael Gray is a hugely respected and established British DJ and music producer, best known for his hits ‘The Weekend’ & ‘Borderline’. London-based Michael is one of the most in-demand Artists on the global dance music scene today. Having relaunched his solo career as Michael Gray in 2018 to pursue his original love of Disco, Michael has already become the world #2 Soul/Funk/Disco Artist on Traxsource in 2019 - an incredible achievement and a worthy accolade for Michael's world-class production skills. Throw into the mix awesome DJ sets at the best events in the UK Glitterbox & Defected etc. He has DJ’d all over the world from MOS in London to Hi & Pacha in Ibiza and as far and wide as Poland, Germany, The Philippines, Australia, Russia, Brazil, Georgia, Spain and The Netherlands.

2019 was an incredible year for Michael by any standards - along with the aforementioned #2 ranked Traxsource Soul/Funk/Disco Artist, Michael was ranked #6 in Traxsource's Overall Best Artists, and his remix of Sylvester’s 'You make me feel' (Sultra Records) was Traxsource's second best-selling track of 2019.

2020 Michael was awarded Artist of the year on Traxsource (highest sales) This is he celebrated with a guest mix on Traxsource Live ! https://bit.ly/Traxsource-LIVE... Also his huge worldwide hit 'The Weekend' was re released and reworked by Michael himself as Michael’s Sultra Remix (already played on BBC Radio Pete Tong and Breakfast Show).
